Package it.trvi.easyxml

Class XMLTreeBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.trvi.easyxml.XMLTreeBuilder
public class XMLTreeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Class that provides functions to parse XML code into an XMLElement.

    • buildFromString

      public static XMLElement buildFromString​(java.lang.String string) throws java.text.ParseException
      Parses into an XMLElement the XML code contained in a string.
      Parameters:
      string - contains the XML code
      Returns:
      the parsed XMLElement containing the whole XML tree
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if there's an error in the XML code

    • buildFromFile

      public static XMLElement buildFromFile​(java.lang.String path) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.text.ParseException
      Parses into an XMLElement the XML code contained in a file.
      Parameters:
      path - contains the path of the file
      Returns:
      the parsed XMLElement containing the whole XML tree
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if there's an error in the XML code
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file in the specified path does not exist

    • buildFromFile

      public static XMLElement buildFromFile​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.text.ParseException
      Parses into an XMLElement the XML code contained in a file.
      Parameters:
      file - is the file
      Returns:
      the parsed XMLElement containing the whole XML tree
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if there's an error in the XML code
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist

    • buildFromStream

      public static XMLElement buildFromStream​(java.io.InputStream stream) throws java.text.ParseException, java.io.IOException
      Parses into an XMLElement the XML code read from an InputStream.
      Parameters:
      stream - is the InputStream
      Returns:
      the parsed XMLElement containing the whole XML tree
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if there's an error in the XML code
      java.io.IOException - if there's an error while reading from the InputStream
